title: Workshop on Educational Research Methodology Using Meta-Analysis and Qualitative Research Synthesis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational research methodologies and basic knowledge in mathematics education
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen mathematics education research competencies for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, considering smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Can apply meta-analysis techniques to systematically compare and analyze diverse educational research contexts
Can synthesize qualitative research data to derive an integrated interpretation of educational phenomena
Can perform statistical analysis and visualization using small-scale research data to effectively communicate findings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
